text: Ochrosia borbonica is a species of plant in the family Apocynaceae. It is native to Mauritius and Réunion, and naturalized in Guangdong Province in China.Kew World Checklist of Selected Plant FamiliesFlora of China Vol. 16 Page 163 玫瑰树 mei gui shu Ochrosia borbonica J. F. Gmelin, Syst. Nat. 2: 439. 1796. The species is listed as endangered.Strahm, W. 1998. Ochrosia borbonica. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Downloaded on 22 August 2007. ==References== borbonica Category:Endangered plants Category:Flora of Mauritius Category:Flora of Réunion Category:Plants described in 1791 Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Ochrosia borbonica
